Title: Enacts the "access to comprehensive cancer enhanced services strategy (ACCESS) demonstration project"
Summary: Enacts the "access to comprehensive cancer enhanced services strategy (ACCESS) demonstration project" to assure more equitable access to specialized cancer care; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Amd §268-d, Pub Health L; amd §§364-j & 369-gg, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the social services law, in relation to assuring more equitable access to specialized cancer care; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
